Text: The Smurfs: The Legend of Smurfy Hollow is an American computer/traditionally animated short film based on "The Smurfs" comic book series created by the Belgian comics artist Peyo.

1: The Smurfs: The Legend of Smurfy Hollow
The Smurfs: The Legend of Smurfy Hollow

--------------------
Text: The Smurfs: The Legend of Smurfy Hollow:  The animated short was written by Todd Berger and directed by Stephan Franck, and it stars the voices of Melissa Sturm, Fred Armisen, Anton Yelchin, Alan Cumming and Hank Azaria.
